name: mine construction, phosphate rock | mine infrastructure, phosphate rock | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3987/documentation

Large uncertainties for equipment used due to weak data from only 2 mines and various assumtions.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Mining equipment, equipment for beneficiation, buildings for beneficiation plant, land use of processing pant.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Resource Extraction; Minerals

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of literature publication. Measurements took place partly before this period.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Assumption for infrastructure based on weak data of 1 Moroccan and 1 U.S. mine.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Extrapolation from 1 U.S. and 1 Moroccan mine. The moroccan mine concerned has 30% market share, therefore representativeness set to 30%..
